de.dirkgasser.brauen

Class Heater

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dirkgasser.brauen.Heater

  • public class Heater
extends java.lang.Object
    Java class to handle a GPIO pin of Raspberry Pi as Heater
    can also be used to switch on or off any pin
    Pin is taken as Address, so column "wPI" of "GPIO readall" command
